comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Identical picture from Agence Meurisse on Gallica site (note Meurisse catalog number on Bain photo). Bain seems to have inadvertently reversed the image, assuming Meurisse has it oriented correctly. gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b90420179

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog: Thank you for finding the matching image on the Gallica website. As you point out,  the Bain image is reversed from the Agence Meurisse version.  The Bain image  is also cropped at the top and the Agence Meurisse image (being the original)  is sharper, with more detail.  We will add more information to the image description when we update the database.
